root.name: Cool Cool Toon
root.description: GameplayThe letters A, B, X and Y appear at the edge or in the middle of a large circle on screen. The player must use the analogue stick to move a marker to the letter and press the corresponding button on the controller at the right time. If the player misses too many letters, they will fail.Reception ReceptionReview scoresPublicationScoreGameSpot7.0IGN7.8Reception on the game has been mostly positive. Reviewers praised the art style and original use of the analogue stick.
